channel.title: How to add kalphite queen to my server?
channel.description:
Project insanity 317
I have the zone and area for it. how do i add the npc on my server. with drops? be as specific as possible please.
i want to make it drop dragon claws, cash, d chain, and all barrows items randomly.. please help

item.title: How to add kalphite queen to my server?
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

in your server folder go to data, then cfg and you should she spawn-config and npc drops add the npc to the spawn-config and add what u want it to drop in npc drops. GL
